edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui
Class SearchResultsPreviewPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.SearchResultsPreviewPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookmarkSearchResultsListener, SearchResultsListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class SearchResultsPreviewPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements SearchResultsListener, BookmarkSearchResultsListener

This is the body of the full-window search interface. It shows the documents that match the current search criteria. Full text searches are displayed in order of relevance. It displays a preview of each file.

See Also:
Serialized Form
